channel.title: A day in the life of a CISO on Vandana Verma
channel.description: Recent content in A day in the life of a CISO on Vandana Verma

item.title: Episode 1 - Sarb Sembhi
item.description: Sarb Sembhi https://www.linkedin.com/in/sarbsembhi/ Bio:- Sarb is a CTO & CISO speaking, writing and contributing to many events and publications. He is the Founder of the Security2Live Initiative (which raises Digital Safety Skills). He Mentors Cyber Security Start-ups (and help with getting them into the market) and other start-ups as the Cyber Security advisor, and am a Board Advisor to several companies. In 2020, he was honoured to be shortlisted 5 in the IFSecGlobal 2020 20 Most Influential People in Security.
